share.instructions_tap: Tap and hold to copy the image below, tap "$t(buttons.copyAlt)" to copy text description
share.instructions_click: Right click to copy the image below, click "$t(buttons.copyAlt)" to copy text description
share.description: emoji-based bookle scorecard for this round

info.credit: This game was created by Chase Caster
info.bugs: The only thing I like more than compliments is bug reports!
info.lingule: Guess the language of the mystery word each day

settings.shareHint: (use "share options" in bottom right to change)
settings.shareSpoilers: Emoji text with discord style spoilers
settings.languageDisclaimer: All translations are from english, and entirely amateur. Any and all corrections welcome.
settings.languageExplanation: The books themselves will remain in English until I find the resources to get them all translated.

howto.intro: Every day you'll be given the opening line to a new book. You get six guesses to figure out what the book is.
howto.afterGuess: After each guess, if you don't get the book right, you'll see whether you got the correct author, and whether the target book was published before or after the book you guessed.

example.phrase: For example, you might be given the following opening line:
example.guess: If you guessed the book 'Oliver Twist', you would see the this:
example.explain: It is telling you that, while you didn't get the book right, you did get the correct author. The up arrow by the year tells you that the book you're after was published after 'Oliver Tiwst'
